name: Michael M. Folkerts, C.Phil.
body:
### Physics
I earned my Bachelor's and Master's degrees in physics from the University of California San Diego (UCSD) where I will soon complete my doctorate in Biophysics. My passion is applied science and my current focus is Medical Physics/Radiation Oncology research. My thesis project focuses on patient-specific quality assurance and automated treatment planning. 

### Software
I have dabbled in full-stack software development and have experience with a few popular languages like C/C++, Java, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, and Python (my favorite). I use my development skills to support my own research.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
